00017 template <typename run_cursor_type,
00018           typename run_cursor_cmp_type,
00019           unsigned buffer_size>
00020 class loser_tree
00021 {
00022     loser_tree () { }    // forbidden
00023     loser_tree (const loser_tree &);    // forbidden
00024     loser_tree & operator = (const loser_tree &);    // forbidden
00025 
00026     int logK;
00027     int_type k;
00028     int_type * entry;
00029     run_cursor_type * current;
00030     run_cursor_cmp_type cmp;
00031 
00032     int_type init_winner (int_type root)
00033     {
00034         if (root >= k)
00035         {
00036             return root - k;
00037         }
00038         else
00039         {
00040             int_type left = init_winner (2 * root);
00041             int_type right = init_winner (2 * root + 1);
00042             if (cmp (current[left], current[right]))
00043             {
00044                 entry[root] = right;
00045                 return left;
00046             }
00047             else
00048             {
00049                 entry[root] = left;
00050                 return right;
00051             }
00052         }
00053     }
00054 public:
00055     typedef typename run_cursor_type::prefetcher_type prefetcher_type;
00056     typedef typename run_cursor_type::value_type value_type;
00057 
00058     loser_tree (
00059         prefetcher_type * p,
00060         int_type nruns,
00061         run_cursor_cmp_type c) : cmp(c)
00062     {
00063         int_type i;
00064         logK = static_cast < int >(ceil (log (double (nruns)) / log (2.)));             // replace with something smart
00065         int_type kReg = k = (1 << logK);
00066 
00067         STXXL_VERBOSE2("loser_tree: logK=" << logK << " nruns=" << nruns << " K=" << kReg);
00068 
00069 #ifdef STXXL_SORT_SINGLE_PREFETCHER
00070         current = new run_cursor_type[kReg];
00071         run_cursor_type::prefetcher() = p;
00072 #else
00073         current = new run_cursor_type[kReg];
00074         for (i = 0; i < kReg; ++i)
00075             current[i].prefetcher() = p;
00076 
00077 #endif
00078         entry = new int_type[(kReg << 1)];
00079         // init cursors
00080         for (i = 0; i < nruns; ++i)
00081         {
00082             current[i].buffer = p->pull_block();
00083             //current[i].pos = 0; // done in constructor
00084             entry[kReg + i] = i;
00085         }
00086 
00087         for (i = nruns; i < kReg; ++i)
00088         {
00089             current[i].make_inf ();
00090             entry[kReg + i] = i;
00091         }
00092 
00093         entry[0] = init_winner (1);
00094     }
00095     ~loser_tree()
00096     {
00097         delete [] current;
00098         delete [] entry;
00099     }
00100 
00101     void swap(loser_tree & obj)
00102     {
00103         std::swap(logK, obj.logK);
00104         std::swap(k, obj.k);
00105         std::swap(entry, obj.entry);
00106         std::swap(current, obj.current);
00107         std::swap(cmp, obj.cmp);
00108     }
00109 
00110 private:
00111     template < unsigned LogK > void multi_merge_unrolled (value_type * to)
00112     {
00113         run_cursor_type * currentE, * winnerE;
00114         int_type * regEntry = entry;
00115         value_type * done = to + buffer_size;
00116         int_type winnerIndex = regEntry[0];
00117 
00118         while (LIKELY (to < done))
00119         {
00120             winnerE = current + winnerIndex;
00121             *(to++) = winnerE->current ();
00122 
00123             (*winnerE)++;
00124 
00125 
00126 #define TreeStep(L)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00127     if (LogK >= L ) \
00128     { \
00129         currentE = current + \
00130                    regEntry[ (winnerIndex + (1 << LogK)) >> (((int (LogK - L) + 1) >= 0) ? ((LogK - L) + 1) : 0) ]; \
00131         if ( cmp(*currentE, *winnerE) ) \
00132         { \
00133             std::swap(regEntry[(winnerIndex + (1 << LogK))                                         \
00134                                >> (((int (LogK - L) + 1) >= 0) ? ((LogK - L) + 1) : 0) ], winnerIndex);                      \
00135             winnerE = currentE;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00136         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   \
00137     }
00138 
00139             TreeStep (10);
00140             TreeStep (9);
00141             TreeStep (8);
00142             TreeStep (7);
00143             TreeStep (6);
00144             TreeStep (5);
00145             TreeStep (4);
00146             TreeStep (3);
00147             TreeStep (2);
00148             TreeStep (1);
00149 
00150 #undef TreeStep
00151 
00152         }
00153 
00154         regEntry[0] = winnerIndex;
00155 
00156     }
00157 
00158     void multi_merge_unrolled_0 (value_type * to)
00159     {
00160         const value_type * done = to + buffer_size;
00161         while (to < done)
00162         {
00163             *to = current->current ();
00164             ++to;
00165             (*current)++;
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     void multi_merge_k (value_type * to)
00170     {
00171         run_cursor_type * currentE, * winnerE;
00172         int_type kReg = k;
00173         value_type * done = to + buffer_size;
00174         int_type winnerIndex = entry[0];
00175 
00176         while (LIKELY (to < done))
00177         {
00178             winnerE = current + winnerIndex;
00179             *(to++) = winnerE->current ();
00180 
00181             (*winnerE)++;
00182 
00183             for (int_type i = (winnerIndex + kReg) >> 1; i > 0; i >>= 1)
00184             {
00185                 currentE = current + entry[i];
00186 
00187                 if (cmp (*currentE, *winnerE))
00188                 {
00189                     std::swap (entry[i], winnerIndex);
00190                     winnerE = currentE;
00191                 }
00192             }
00193         }
00194 
00195         entry[0] = winnerIndex;
00196     }
00197 
00198 public:
00199     void multi_merge (value_type * to)
00200     {
00201         switch (logK)
00202         {
00203         case 0:
00204             multi_merge_unrolled_0 (to);
00205             break;
00206         case 1:
00207             multi_merge_unrolled < 1 > (to);
00208             break;
00209         case 2:
00210             multi_merge_unrolled < 2 > (to);
00211             break;
00212         case 3:
00213             multi_merge_unrolled < 3 > (to);
00214             break;
00215         case 4:
00216             multi_merge_unrolled < 4 > (to);
00217             break;
00218         case 5:
00219             multi_merge_unrolled < 5 > (to);
00220             break;
00221         case 6:
00222             multi_merge_unrolled < 6 > (to);
00223             break;
00224         case 7:
00225             multi_merge_unrolled < 7 > (to);
00226             break;
00227         case 8:
00228             multi_merge_unrolled < 8 > (to);
00229             break;
00230         case 9:
00231             multi_merge_unrolled < 9 > (to);
00232             break;
00233         case 10:
00234             multi_merge_unrolled < 10 > (to);
00235             break;
00236         default:
00237             multi_merge_k (to);
00238             break;
00239         }
00240     }
00241 };

00245 namespace std
00246 {
00247     template <      typename run_cursor_type,
00248               typename run_cursor_cmp_type,
00249               unsigned buffer_size>
00250     void swap(stxxl::loser_tree < run_cursor_type, run_cursor_cmp_type, buffer_size > & a,
00251               stxxl::loser_tree<run_cursor_type, run_cursor_cmp_type, buffer_size> & b)
00252     {
00253         a.swap(b);
00254     }
00255 }
